Khavatari Rosheek:
What brings you to this desolate snowfield, young traveler? I am Rosheek, who trains Kabart, the traditional martial art of the Orcs.
As the god Paagrio has taught us, we must continuously make an effort to strengthen ourselves above all the other creatures that live. I have stayed in this place for the past month, fasting and meditating, to discipline myself in order to reach a higher level of strength.
When my mind concentrates to fight the severe cold and hunger, I can feel the heat of the combative spirit that burns like a flame within me. How would you like to meditate here with me?
